hero.megamix_description:
The biggest hits Born in Moldova from the last 25 years. 
Mega Mix — an hour where legendary songs will be brought back into the spotlight through live performances by artists on stage or through innovative digital showcases.

about.title: About Festival
about.description:
Do you love Moldova? You're not alone! You're of one of ours. 

Născut în Moldova is the Festival of Our Music. 
Its purpose is to inspire people to love Moldova.
 Regardless of ethnicity, language, religion, gender, or age, our people are united by a shared sense of home and a common cultural identity.

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: Partners of the Born in Moldova Festival

faq.question: Are there age restrictions?
faq.answer:
✔️ Yes, festival access is allowed as follows:

  • For persons 16 years and older – can purchase tickets and attend the festival independently.
  • For persons under 16 – must be accompanied by an adult.

faq.question: Can I buy tickets on-site? How can I pay?
faq.answer:
✔️ Yes, tickets can be purchased on-site. Payment can be made in cash or by card.

✔️ Until the festival, tickets are available online at afisha.md.

faq.question: Will there be toilets and a cloakroom?
faq.answer:
✔️ Yes, festival attendees will have access to toilets – which will be available at the Zimbru Stadium.

❌ There will be no cloakroom, and storage of unattended personal items will not be possible.

faq.question: Will food and water be available for purchase?
faq.answer:
✔️ Yes, there will be food and beverage vendors.​

⚠️ Restrictions:

  • In the grass area – only still water is allowed.
  • In the stands area – food and drinks are allowed.

faq.question: How long will the festival last?
faq.answer:
✔️ Open Doors: 12:00 / 13:00 (exact time to be announced later).

✔️ Festival ends at: 00:00 (midnight)

faq.question: Will there be parking spaces?
faq.answer:
❌ No

✔️ Attendees are advised to plan their transportation accordingly.

faq.question: How can I get to the festival?
Will there be security and medical assistance?
faq.answer: ✔️ Yes, security services and medical assistance will be provided throughout the festival.

faq.question: What can I bring to the festival?
faq.answer:
✔️ A good mood! 😃​

❌ Prohibited items:

  • Food and drinks brought from outside.
  • Dangerous items (see festival rules).

faq.question: How can I pay for products at the festival?
faq.answer: ✔️ All purchases at the festival can be paid for in cash or by card.

faq.question: Will official merchendise (t-shirts, caps, etc.) be available?
faq.answer: ✔️ Yes, official festival merchandise (t-shirts, caps, accessories) will be available for purchase.

faq.question: Are there any passes for families, friends, or groups?
faq.answer:
✔️ Yes, there are special packages and subscriptions for groups.

✔️ Prices and details are available on the website and on afisha.md.

faq.question: What happens if the festival is postponed?
faq.answer:
✔️ If the festival is cancelled – ticket refunds will be issued.

✔️ If the festival is rescheduled – purchased tickets will remain valid for the new date.
